alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 2:57PM PST until February 27 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated accumulations up to 3 inches possible near Amboy, near the foothills to the Coast Range and elevations of 500 feet or more.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
